Label: TMEM173
Comment: cGAS which signals via STING (encoded by TMEM173)

Label: TREX1
Comment: Cytosolic deoxyribonuclease anchored in the outer nuclear membrane. A lack of TREX1 causes DNA accumulation, both within the nucleus and the cytosol.

Label: ADAR
Comment: Catalyzes the hydrolytic deamination of adenosine to inosine in double-stranded RNA (dsRNA) referred to as A-to-I RNA editing

Label: MDA5
Comment: Cytosolic RNA sensor</br>Activating mutations in RIG-I and MDA5 increase receptor affinity resulting in constitutive type I IFN signaling.

Label: RIG-I
Comment: cytosolic RNA sensor</br>Activating mutations in RIG-I and MDA5 increase receptor affinity resulting in constitutive type I IFN signaling.

Label: SAMHD1
Comment: SAMHD1 has also ribonuclease activity, suggesting that a loss of SAMHD1 may lead to RNA accumulation.
